feature.label: i:FAO Plugin Feature
feature.description: The i:FAO Plugin contains useful applications for arctic developers Change log: 2.1.14 - Adapted Evolvi_XML Builder to new WSDL/new URLs 2.1.13 - Improvements for SNCF; handling redirect responses ("The document has moved") for imported schemas 2.1.7 - Fix of boolean treatment in NEW-CIB Interface generating. Fix of compile error 2.1.6 - Fix of boolean treatment in NEW-CIB Interface generating 2.1.4 - SNCF: fixed path for generated schemas - NEWCIB: Dependencies AIRLINE and CUBE_CHANNEL are now lists. Added new dependency BOOKING_CHANNEL. 2.1.3 - fixed creation of NVS schemas 2.1.2 - improvements for ImportNewCib (DT 30744 Amadeus Fare Families: Enhancements for agent UpdateAncillaryServiceInfo) 2.0.9 - improvement of colours in DTDInfo 2.0.8 - improvements for the DTDInfo tool (see DT 30192 Improve the DTDinfo tool to avoid a unintended leaving without saved content) 2.0.7 - fixed SchemaGenerator for Travelfusion (DT 30529) 2.0.6 - fixed determination of project output path in Util class 2.0.5 - fixed Java version problems 2.0.4 - Added AncillaryTools to the plugin 1.9.6 - Adapted DependencyTypeMapper to new Dependency, delivered by CIG (UpdateAncillaryServiceInfo). 1.9.2 - Adapted pw for ifaoKey in KeystoreEditor 1.9.1 - Extension SchemaGenerator for UpdateAncillaryServiceInfo (NewCIB) 1.8.22 - Fix for Travelfusion; unreachable schemas in import/include definitions will be ignored 1.8.20 - Fix for SNCF Riva 21 - Using CastorSerializer instead of Common for marshalling/unmarshalling 1.8.10 - Adaption to new KeyStore password 1.8.9 - Create for Sabre one package name for each XSD starting with "STL_" (in bindings.xjb) (DT 26888) 1.8.8 - Adaptions for NVS response messages required for NVS 24 (DT 26615) 1.8.4 - Adapted SchemaGenerator for SNCF Riva 18 1.8.2 - Enhanced EvolviXML generator to create the following additional bindings, if the phase 12 environment is used as source (see DT 26568): <attributeBinding name="/JourneyDetailsRS/@EngineeringWork"> <member java-type="java.lang.String" /> </attributeBinding> <attributeBinding name="/JourneyDetailsRS/@ZonalLocations"> <member java-type="java.lang.String" /> </attributeBinding> <attributeBinding name="complexType:TrainSegmentType/@JourneyDuration"> <member java-type="java.lang.String" /> </attributeBinding> <attributeBinding name="complexType:RailFareType/FareClassification/@ValidityCode"> <member java-type="java.lang.String" /> </attributeBinding> 1.8.1 - Removed the Generators for Linkon 1.7.9 - Added new webservice (Publishing) to the Silverrail tab 1.7.3 - reading ifaoKey.jks from conf/ssl directory, if not found in dtd/ssl 1.6.16 - fixed handling of SSL connections; Silverrail needs arctic keyStore to download the WSDLs 1.6.15 - added creation of bindings for enumeration values 1.6.14 - added JaxB EnumBindingCorrector 1.6.11 - improved creation of Silverrail packages to have package commontypes only once 1.6.10 - added tab Rail/Silverrail to create Silverrail communication classes 1.6.2 - fixed error in generated file LinkonVersions.java 1.6.1 - Improved exception handling in the classes generated for Linkon 1.5.10 - Added option xs:dateTime to tab "Complete Directory" (see DT 23067) 1.5.6 - Added correction for MasterCard (changing defaults of StateProvince elements to "UNK") 1.5.3 - Added tab CreditCard/MasterCard for CDF Transmission File classes 1.4.6 - Added tab Rail/Bibe Wsdl to create Bibe communication classes using castor 1.4.2 - Added support for new providerdata concept for tab NVS ServiceCatalogue - Added support for new providerdata concept for tab NVS Wsdl - Added tab NVS ResponseMsgs for creating data.xsd for response messages msg.xml/vb.xml (named data.xml on disk) - Improved keystore editor: added possibility to enter password for private key when adding the private key to the keystore 1.3.18 - Schema Generator: Multiple restriction/patterns will be reduced to 1 single pattern (see DT 21265) 1.3.17 - R2a Generator: Renaming of interface Log to IArcticLog 1.2.43 - Evolvi XML: Adaptions to new ProviderData concept 1.2.41 - JUnit Tester: Fixed problem with new ProviderData concept 1.2.40 - JUnit Tester: Tried to fix problem with new ProviderData concept, but failed 1.2.39 - JUnit Tester: Tried to fix problem with new ProviderData concept, but failed - SchemaGenerator for WSDLs: Adaptions to new ProviderData concept 1.2.38 - SNCF: Adaptions to new ProviderData concept 1.2.37 - Bahn NVS: Added Tab for generating the communication classes from the NVSGUS.wsdl file 1.2.33 - Evolvi: Fix for SeatAssignment/CarNumber and SeatAssignment/SeatNumber (usage of type string instead of type positiveInteger)
feature.license: i:FAO use only. Use at your own risk ;-)

update.label: Local iFAO Update Site for Eclipse

discovery.label: Local Update Site for Eclipse 3.4 features
